metrics_conclusion: Open Fire has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity.
key_conclusion: Open Fire has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Mixolydian,  and D Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!

metadata.editComments: recast it as Dmajor rather than mixo as per @trevordeclercq.  The reason for it is because the original lead scale played throughout the song (see intro) is in mixolydian scale, rather than major.
